official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to designated eligible entities for the design and implementation of innovative models of patient care that are conducive to retention and recruitment of nurses, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Patient Care Innovation Act of 2001 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make grants to designated eligible hospitals and nursing facilities for the design and implementation of innovative models that provide high quality patient care, recognize and effectively use the professional competencies of nurses, and create an environment conducive to their retention and recruitment.
